title: bellapierre Best in Pout Kit | Lip Scrub, Mineral Lipstick, Gel Lip Liner & Clear Lip Gloss | Non-Toxic and Paraben Free | Oil and Cruelty Free - Velvet Rose
features: PERFECT FOR ALL EVENTS: Create your one of a kind look with bellapierre’s Best in Eyes Kit! This dynamic make up kit will make you stand out whether you are at the office or a night out on the town. Add the perfect finishing touch to your look!
EASY TO USE: Using the Best in Pout Kit, start off with the lip scrub to prepare lips. Then Line lips with Gel Lip Liner and apply mineral lip stick and top off with clear lip gloss.

BUTTERY SMOOTH: These buttery-smooth products glide on effortlessly to give you a brilliant, flawless look. You’ll be amazed by its gentle, lightweight formula. It’s designed to go on smoothly so it feels soft and light on your lips.

MULTI-USE: Our Best in Pout Kit is incredibly versatile and easy to use, making your makeup routine a breeze. Achieve flawless, radiant lips using the fan favorite, lip scrub, mineral lipstick, gel liner, and clear lip gloss.

BELLAPIERRE QUALITY: At Bellapierre, we hold true to our 4 core values: purity, variety, simplicity, and quality. That’s because our products are made with the safest ingredients, making our cosmetics non-toxic and paraben-free. We’re also entirely animal cruelty-free. Experience our on-trend cosmetics for yourself by ordering today!
description: The Best in Pout Kit was expertly curated to include Bellapierre’s bestselling mineral Lip makeup products. Each product is formulated with only safe and natural ingredients which are noncomedogenic and gentle, making them suitable for any skin type.

Dip a towel into warm water and cover lips for 2-4 minutes before use for better results. Gently massage lips in a circular motion until salt crystals are dissolved. Rinse with warm water and pat dry with a towel.

Line your lips following their natural shape. To help your Mineral Lipstick last longer, use the side of the lip liner pencil to fill in your lips with color before applying.
